reviews.text:
Great, Modern Barber shop with some fantastic Barbers.  Brilliant range of products available and great hospitality.

Recommend to book online as it can get busy but you can always just wait on the comfy couches and you will always get a haircut.

Defo worth a visit
reviews.original_text:
